title: Pork, chorizo and butter bean stew
description: A real rib-sticker, this stew. Slow down and extend the cooking time (adding liquid if necessary) if you like it really tender.
ingredients: 600g/1lb 5½oz pork shoulder, cut into serving pieces
1 bird's-eye chilli, seeds removed, flesh chopped
200g/7oz canned butter beans, rinsed and drained
